channel.title: Comments for Six Degrees of Procrastination

item.title: Comment on Day 37 – Endeavouring through Mongolia by Sheila Cooper
item.dc:creator: Sheila Cooper
item.description: Delighted to see you have made Ulaanbaatar, well done all of you. Looking forward to seeing you all at Heathrow next Thursday. Take care, Sheila and Dave Cooper
item.content:encoded: Delighted to see you have made Ulaanbaatar, well done all of you. Looking forward to seeing you all at Heathrow next Thursday. Take care, Sheila and Dave Cooper

item.title: Comment on Day 37 – Endeavouring through Mongolia by steve
item.dc:creator: steve
item.description: Sorry to hear about Adventure, at least she reached Mongolia. Pleased to see you are endeavouring on towards Ulaanbaatar. Hope you stay dry. Best wishes Steve & Sue
item.content:encoded: Sorry to hear about Adventure, at least she reached Mongolia. Pleased to see you are endeavouring on towards Ulaanbaatar. Hope you stay dry. Best wishes Steve & Sue

item.title: Comment on Day 29 – Truckin’ through Kazakhstan by Sheila Cooper
item.dc:creator: Sheila Cooper
item.description:
Wow boys what an adventure! We are following you all the way and I can definitely say my geography has improved over the last few weeks. What with your travels and the olympics on the telly not getting a lot of other stuff done.
Looking forward to seeing you again.
Love from
Sheila and Dave
item.content:encoded:
Wow boys what an adventure! We are following you all the way and I can definitely say my geography has improved over the last few weeks. What with your travels and the olympics on the telly not getting a lot of other stuff done.

Looking forward to seeing you again.

Love from

Sheila and Dave

item.title: Comment on Day 29 – Truckin’ through Kazakhstan by Prue and Raul
item.dc:creator: Prue and Raul
item.description:
We're filled with admiration at your exploits - you deserve a gold medal - we'll ask the Olympic Games committee to consider it!!!!
Fancied the lamb meal - get the recipe!
We're following you every day - God bless - P and R
item.content:encoded:
We’re filled with admiration at your exploits – you deserve a gold medal – we’ll ask the Olympic Games committee
to consider it!!!!

Fancied the lamb meal – get the recipe!

We’re following you every day – God bless – P and R

item.title: Comment on Day 24 – Turkmenistan – Uzbekistan by steve
item.dc:creator: steve
item.description:
What a week! Don't know when you'll be back on here but here's a little something to help you on your way through the desert. You'll have to work on the syllable to note ratios! Feel free to add more verses ad nauseam.
GO EAST
(Together) We went on our way (Together) On a Saturday (Together) Mongolia is our aim (Together) We must be insane
(Together) We will eat and sleep (Together) Beware of those mountain sheep (Together) We will drive so far (Together) Drink in the world’s best bar
(Go East) To Ulaanbaatar (Go East) Seven lads, that’s who we are (Go East) In our ambulances (Go East) With no extravagances
(Go East, this is what we're gonna do, Go East)
(Together) Blogging as we go along (Together) Singing this cheery song (Together) We will see the sites (Together) And hope we don’t get the sh*tes
(Together) in Ad-ven-tu-re (Together) and En-dea-vo-ur (Together) we’ll have 10k on the clock (Together) plus a re-machined engine block
(Go Help) is the charity (Go Help) bringing prosperity (Go Help) in Asia from coast to coast (Go Help) to those who need it most
(Together) We Go East not West (Together) There’s no need for a vest (Together) With dodgy language skills (Together) We keep taking the pills
(Together) Matt, Greg, Rich (known as Pauly D) (Together) Ian, Alex, Neil not forgetting Berry (Together) Young, free & living the dream (Together) We’re the SDOP team
(Go East) To Ulaanbaatar (Go East) Seven lads, that’s who we are (Go East) In our ambulances (Go East) With no extravagances
(Go East, this is what we're gonna do, Go East)
item.content:encoded:
What a week! Don’t know when you’ll be back on here but here’s a little something to help you on your way through the desert. You’ll have to work on the syllable to note ratios! Feel free to add more verses ad nauseam.

GO EAST

(Together) We went on our way
(Together) On a Saturday
(Together) Mongolia is our aim
(Together) We must be insane

(Together) We will eat and sleep
(Together) Beware of those mountain sheep
(Together) We will drive so far
(Together) Drink in the world’s best bar

(Go East) To Ulaanbaatar
(Go East) Seven lads, that’s who we are
(Go East) In our ambulances
(Go East) With no extravagances

(Go East, this is what we’re gonna do, Go East)

(Together) Blogging as we go along
(Together) Singing this cheery song
(Together) We will see the sites
(Together) And hope we don’t get the sh*tes

(Together) in Ad-ven-tu-re
(Together) and En-dea-vo-ur
(Together) we’ll have 10k on the clock
(Together) plus a re-machined engine block

(Go Help) is the charity
(Go Help) bringing prosperity
(Go Help) in Asia from coast to coast
(Go Help) to those who need it most

(Together) We Go East not West
(Together) There’s no need for a vest
(Together) With dodgy language skills
(Together) We keep taking the pills

(Together) Matt, Greg, Rich (known as Pauly D)
(Together) Ian, Alex, Neil not forgetting Berry
(Together) Young, free & living the dream
(Together) We’re the SDOP team

(Go East) To Ulaanbaatar
(Go East) Seven lads, that’s who we are
(Go East) In our ambulances
(Go East) With no extravagances

(Go East, this is what we’re gonna do, Go East)

item.title: Comment on Day 24 – Turkmenistan – Uzbekistan by Alistair Lynn
item.dc:creator: Alistair Lynn
item.description: Hope the Kazakhstan border is as simple to get through!
item.content:encoded: Hope the Kazakhstan border is as simple to get through!

item.title: Comment on Day 24 – Turkmenistan – Uzbekistan by Gayle
item.dc:creator: Gayle
item.description: Glad to hear you guys have got so far already. We have just arrived in Khiva and enjoying a shower and beer! Good luck for the next section!
item.content:encoded: Glad to hear you guys have got so far already. We have just arrived in Khiva and enjoying a shower and beer! Good luck for the next section!

item.title: Comment on Day 18 – Waiting for the Ferry by Jason Buckley
item.dc:creator: Jason Buckley
item.description: Still watching you guys, from the comfort of a Prague campsite. Can imagine the heat is grim, keep going chaps, enjoying reading your updates, cheers, Jay (met you bunch of heros in Budapest)
item.content:encoded: Still watching you guys, from the comfort of a Prague campsite. Can imagine the heat is grim, keep going chaps, enjoying reading your updates, cheers, Jay (met you bunch of heros in Budapest)

item.title: Comment on Day 18 – Waiting for the Ferry by steve
item.dc:creator: steve
item.description: Good to have the update. I thought the tracker had been strapped to a stray cat roaming the streets of Baku! Glad you're across the Caspian, hope you can get on now. (27th July)
item.content:encoded: Good to have the update. I thought the tracker had been strapped to a stray cat roaming the streets of Baku! Glad you’re across the Caspian, hope you can get on now. (27th July)

item.title: Comment on Day 13 – Turkey: The land of unfinished roads by Sheila, Dave & Pat
item.dc:creator: Sheila, Dave & Pat
item.description: Hi A&E. Really good to follow the progress, and read your blogs. Really pleased that you appear to be making good progress in spite of mechanical problems. Please let us know if we can be any more help (!?).
item.content:encoded: Hi A&E. Really good to follow the progress, and read your blogs. Really pleased that you appear to be making good progress in spite of mechanical problems. Please let us know if we can be any more help (!?).
